availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Royse. Father of Sarah E. Royse and Charles R. Royse. Farmer in Adair County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 17. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Columbia, Division 2, p. 17. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Adair County, KY, 1863, p. 426, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Columbia, p. 53.
